website_summaries.verdict: A salon-grade shampoo by Redken that creates full volume on almost any type of texture, from straight strands to curly locks.
pros: Gives hair a fuller appearance by cleaning without stripping, resulting in manageable volume
Formulated to be used on almost any type of hair that is thinning or fine
A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts
cons: Scent isn't appealing to all – can be described as "medicinal."
Somewhat drying on hair that's prone to being dry or brittle in the first place

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing for lots of reasons. For one, unlike drug store shampoos or even high end shampoos you would find at places like Target, this shampoo doesn’t have the fake silicone coating over your hair to give you “silky” hair, it actually has healthy and real ingredients that make your hair better over time. Also, it smells great, the quantity will last you months, and it has helped my hair gain more volume. I don’t like to wash my hair everyday, and this shampoo helps a lot to keep it fresh and clean without looking greasy or flat.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Volume Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I have used Redken products for years, but have just recently started using the Volume Lifting shampoo. My hairdresser recommended it for me because I have fine, thin hair and we were going for a style that requires some lift. This shampoo helps alot with that and it smells so good! I color my hair and this shampoo is gentle enough to use for colored hair. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turned my hair to straw!
customer_reviews.text: My lifelong baby-fine hair feels like straw after using this shampoo. Used it twice, now what do I do with it? Return window closed a few days ago. I know Redken has a good reputation. That's why I purchased this High Rise Volume Lifting Shampoo. But it leaves your hair in a very bad way.
customer_reviews.author: mmm_in_ma

customer_reviews.title: It was thick
customer_reviews.text: It came out of the bottle thick, and it had a nice small. Trying to wash it out of my hair, was almost impossible. It left my hair stiff, and unable to put a comb through it. For a little over $14.00 a bottle, it is over priced. I did get volume, but my hair was fly away after drying it, and it was dull. So far Suave coconut in the gold bottle seems to be the best buy for my hair, it leaves it soft, full of volume, and best of all it washes out of my hair, leaving it soft, for my baby fine hair I would go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this shampoo, I have super fine color treated hair and this shampoo works well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn  M

customer_reviews.title: I have very fine thin product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: the bottle was damaged, not even possible to return, SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hauke

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I am blown away at how great my hair feels after using this shampoo and conditioner!! It was well worth the $20 a bottle!! I have very very thin brittle damaged hair (that I’m trying to grow long) and my hair always falls flat and feels gross. After using the shampoo (and conditioner) my hair feels “Uplifted” if that makes any sense. It feels like it had some weight to it and I feel beautiful. 10/10 would recommend it if you’ve got thin white girl hair like me.
customer_reviews.author: Gogo

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I have an oily scalp and this is the only thing that helps me not to look like I haven't washed my hair in a week by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M H

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair come out
customer_reviews.text: I use this brand on the regular. However this particular formula is horrible. It smells terrible and instead of adding volume it actually caused me to shed more hair than usual. I actually became frightened I was losing my hair. Once I stopped and switched to something different my hair thickened back up. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: kd75

customer_reviews.title: works well--watch the labels with this product line
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered this product when I was actually after the "beach wave" product. I sent the seller a question about the difference between the product and what I had intended to purchase. I received a prompt response to my question. Additionally, I had a hair appointment shortly after receiving the product. My hairdresser said THIS product was a better choice for me than what I had wanted to purchase! All's well that turns out well...
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader67

customer_reviews.title: Volumizing effect for a day or two
customer_reviews.text: My hair is very thin and I have tried several drugstore volumizing shampoos. This is a better than drugstore shampoo but my hair is flat again a day or two after shampooing
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Shampoo after using discontinued Body Full
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine thin hair that is colored and I can wash every 3 days or longer . Shampoo lasts a long time because it only takes a very small amount. The only thing I dont like is the chemicals so I mainly use it if I am going to be going out and want my hair to look extra! I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: Good volume for men.
customer_reviews.text: Great volume for a man. My hair is thinning and flat. I will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, wouldn't recommend everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. Can be drying, would not recommend use everyday. Shampoo and conditioner are very thick and only need a small amount compared to the watered down drug store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Will not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Ths product dried out my hair and stripped the new blonde color. Will not use this again
customer_reviews.author: MARJORIE

customer_reviews.title: A thin/fine hair fix
customer_reviews.text: Added volume and softness to my very fine thin hair.
customer_reviews.author: BGM

customer_reviews.title: The best shampoo ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot if different shampoos, but this one is the best! Smells amazing, doesn't over dry the scalp, and gives a light body to my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Product works great on my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: This product work nice on my fine fair, gives my hair considerably more volume. I use also the Redken High Rise Volumizer Gel, which gives me more control when styling my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is horrible. It made my hair feel like straw and since I bought the large bottle, I’m stuck with it for the next 6 months at least. I told my husband he could have it but he doesn’t like the scent. Don’t buy unless your hair is oily.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how soft my hair felt after using ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how soft my hair felt after using Redken High Rise Volume Lifting Shampoo. Yet, it was still very manageable. I haven't tried this shampoo before, but it will be my go to shampoo from now on. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Martie Sluga

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with the volume it gives
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely giving me a nice volume , but the only problem is it making my hair very rough. Generally I am used to have smooh hair, but thats hard to digest . And it doesnt go at all with any conditioner , I tried to put conditioner after the shampoo, it feel so sticky and dead . So i would suggest no conditioner, if you have thin, straight and silky hair , conditioner is No No .
customer_reviews.author: Kavya Kalasamudram

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It smells amazing and has lasted a long time. I will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.text: I like the way my hair feels after a shampoo followed with the Redken conditioner. Much better control of my gray hair and able to hand form the shape and natural curl. Very happy with this product even though it’s a little more costly than some other products that don’t do the job for me.
customer_reviews.author: El Powell

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: Love how it smells and feels on my hair! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Only shampoo & conditioner that give my fine thin hair volume and body!
customer_reviews.author: Nalani Newton

customer_reviews.title: What a transformation!!
customer_reviews.text: Even after the first time I used this shampoo I didn't lose half of the amount of hair from my head that I have been losing-my hair actually feels and looks thicker and healthier than it has for a look time-Thank-you Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time to get volume shampoo. It is because I think volume one may not have enough nutrients to my color treated hair. It feels so soft and manageable after every use! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: LoLoLi

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to shampoo for fine limp hair. Have tried everything, including Redken’s old product. This is the best I can find right now!!!

customer_reviews.title: Misleading it is a travel bottle total rip off
customer_reviews.text: Walgreens has 10.1 oz for 20.00. What was sent to me 1.7 oz for almost 13.00 felt totally ripped off big let down never again will I buy it
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for years and love how it brings out the volume. I was purchasing from my hair salon for years and found that it was so much cheaper on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Item great shipping not so much
customer_reviews.text: Item is great, however, due to shipping issues, came in crushed shipping box, broken flip top on the bottle.

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo I have very fine hair and it does give it a lot of body and shine
customer_reviews.author: CloverG

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy it again. It did not add volume ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't buy it again. It did not add volume or lift to my baby-fine hair.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love this shampoo. I have short fine hair and this works GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes this shampoo. Says it does an excellent job of adding volume.
customer_reviews.author: James N. Fox

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: i have thin straight hair and this stuff makes it more voluminous and full.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: nice shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a man with thinning hair, this is a decent product. I would also recommend pairing this shampoo with the Tigi Catwalk Highness conditioner - it's not a HUGE difference, but it does help.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for nothing
customer_reviews.text: I used Tresseme before this and changed because my hair started getting oily and with no volume! I bought this because i have used the red one before and was too happy. Honesy i saw no change in my hair with this shampoo, too expensive and has the same effect as Tresseme
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: redken
customer_reviews.text: I just love redken hair products .this shampoo smells heavenly. The delivery was quick. I will def be a custoner again
customer_reviews.author: cheryl a gaston

customer_reviews.title: Very best volume shampoo for ultra-fine delicate hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is the best I've found for my super-fine delicate blonde hair. It is thick, so a little is all you need, and it cleans well without damaging hair or scalp. It leaves your hair healthy, shiny without heaviness, and smells wonderful. It tends to sell out quickly--pick it up when you can!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I did a lot of research on shampoos and found that this was recommended by top hairdressers around the country. I really needed help with the volume and this certainly did help!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Bell

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. The first thing you notice is the amazing scent. I love it. It is now my always use shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Full volume do’s!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of volume and BONUS the biotin seems to be helping my gray hair growth turn back to my dark normal hair color👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: YAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the product that I get at my salon. This is great for volumising. and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: iamfrogie

customer_reviews.title: 5 star!  Love the feel of my hair, and body it gets while drying hair.
customer_reviews.text: Love Redken products. Wish they would bring back women’s cleansing bar soap (red).

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin hair
customer_reviews.text: This works great on thin hair. Gives my roots lift so my hair doesn't look so flat. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Redkin Shampoo is a great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great as usual... reskin products are great! I've been using their products for years.

customer_reviews.title: Used shampoo, not companion conditioner with
customer_reviews.text: This made my fine hair fuzzy. No other volumizing shampoo has done that. Also first Redken shampoo that I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kath

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's convenient to purchase even simple items, like shampoo, from Amazon. The shipping was speedy and the product is just what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this shampoo cleans off all the product I put in my hair...I have fine hair.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and way cheaper to buy it here! Came as described.
customer_reviews.author: BMB + SMB

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I guess it depends on what you expect for the money. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Burke

customer_reviews.title: Left me flat
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but way too expensive for what it does. I found a better shampoo at the local CVS, and at 1/3 the price! Not going to pay for a "name" and empty promises.
customer_reviews.author: damgrantham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for thin fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have baby fine thin hair. This is by far the best shampoo I have used.

customer_reviews.title: Clean and lightweight after use
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin and this is so great on it. My hair feels clean and lightweight and is easy to style after use.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love this top quality shampoo. Been using it for years and it smells great too.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo in a tiny bottle
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. It's great for my fine hair but I should've paid attention to the size description. It's a very small bottle for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I quite like this but won't buy again as it seems to dry my hair out. I need lots of conditioner after using it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Lid isn’t sealed don’t buy. Anything could be in this bottle
customer_reviews.text: This item came unsealed. Very concerning! Anything can be in this bottle. I buy this product all the time from Salons and it’s always sealed and packaged good.
customer_reviews.author: dthieren

customer_reviews.title: works well and smells nice
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend to women with fine hair. It cleans my hair, smells nice, and is lightweight. Styling with blow dryer and a root lift product.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Where is the volume?
customer_reviews.text: I do not know why these shampoo manufacturers claim their product will give rise to a woman's hair. This one does not meet expectations.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Wash
customer_reviews.text: Gives a clean wash but not as voluminizing as I had hoped.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It’s as good or better than the product it replaced. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for service but...
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is not as good as Body Full. Redken messed up.
customer_reviews.author: tommy b

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite volume enhancing shampoo. I have thin oily hair and this works great.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for a long time. Works well. Will continue to buy this product.

customer_reviews.title: Good for multiple users at home
customer_reviews.text: I share this with my brothers so great for family bathrooms

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite shampoo and Amazon has at a good price!

customer_reviews.title: the bottle did mention a hair type, it only mentioned high rise volume
customer_reviews.text: My hair was so flyaway, it was not even manageable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair but it is fine and gray now. I did notice more body with this shampoo.

customer_reviews.title: Great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love the shampoo I’ve been using it for years. However, I received the bottle and the top plastic was broken. Luckily no shampoo leaked out so it’s was salvageable
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo! I use this and the High Rise Volume Lifting Conditioner. I won't be using any other products but these ;)

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to promises.
customer_reviews.text: It left my hair flat and looked unclean the second day
customer_reviews.author: NatB

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good product!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is thin and this tends to help with a nice texture! A beautician first sold me on it! It just takes a dime size drop and no second application! my hair is short and I shampoo every two to three days. My first bottle lasted 9 months. My order was the second bottle and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: GJK

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Best Redken since amino-pon. The bad thing is I found it on sale at my Walmart hairdresser for a few pennies less if you bought two. All in all I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: David Zacheretti

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair completely flat and straight. Tossed it and the money it cost in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Heilio

customer_reviews.title: Used it for years and it adds body to my fine 3 hairs! 😜
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for 3-4 years in my fine, thin hair. The scent is pleasant (very little) and it does add body.

customer_reviews.title: Makes your hair very full.
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my very fine hair be y full.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. Does actually give my hair lift and body. Amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the scent of this product at all. It is very medicinal. And I didn't see that it was particularly volumizing. This product replaced a Redken volumizing shampoo that I loved, but the new version is no replacement for the original.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W. Sirotnik

customer_reviews.title: I am not a fan of the scent of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a fan of the scent of the shampoo. It smells very medicinal to me. My hair feels very clean and it does seem to offer some volume, but hard to tell for sure as I have a permanent also.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shampoo. Gives my short, baby fine hair just enough volume. Smells great and rinses easily.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: Volume
customer_reviews.text: Great volume! Feels like I have a lot more hair!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Keep Hubby happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses it and he won’t go to any other brand!

customer_reviews.title: Great seller & product

customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo. Big bottle easy to use in shower with pump top purchased separately.

customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly and as described . I love this shampoo!

customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser recommended this and it works very well. It keeps my hair clean and full of body without drying it out. It may wash out my hair color over time though. I tried the color safe shampoo by Redken but it doesn't work as well as this so I'm going to continue with this product.

customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and the price was superior to my salon.

product_meta.title: Redken High Rise Volume Shampoo | For Fine Hair | Cleanses Hair While Adding Lift & Body
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl OzRedken's High Rise Volume Lifting Shampoo is the perfect cleanser to eliminate impurities and residue in hair while enhancing hair body. This volumizing shampoo lightly cleanses with gentle scalp care, giving hair a volume-boost, creating lift and body. Leaves hair soft, manageable and shiny. -Root lift and body -Polished finish -Contains a volume-boosing blend of filloxane, softening and silicone polymers

BRAND STORY
Redken 5th Avenue NYC is a professional haircare and haircolor company dedicated to providing science backed products, inspiring education and unparalleled creativity for consumers and stylists alike.
